snippet: Cynthia Gibbs-Pratt, who lives in a Bronx neighborhood far from her family, tries to hide the fact that her eyesight is deteriorating because she doesn’t want to be perceived as vulnerable.
abstract: Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York, one of the agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Cynthia Gibbs-Pratt, whose eyesight is deteriorating, pay her back rent and electricity bill.
lead_paragraph: Cynthia Gibbs-Pratt, who lives in a Bronx neighborhood far from her family, tries to hide the fact that her eyesight is deteriorating because she doesn’t want to be perceived as vulnerable.

headline.print_headline: A Tool Meant to Keep Her Safe Makes Her Feel Like a Target
headline.main: A Tool Meant to Keep Her Safe Makes Her Feel Like a Target
